html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-08402014-06-20CIC,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) provide consistent treatment to foreign artists, regardless of venue type; (2) simplify the administration of the work permit process; and (3) maintain opportunities for Canadian artists who benefit from the continued viability of smaller venues and opportunities to tour with foreign acts.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0170 Publication Date: 2014-07-02
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) provide consistent treatment to foreign artists, regardless of venue type; (2) simplify the administration of the work permit  process; and (3) maintain opportunities for Canadian artists who benefit from the continued viability of smaller venues and opportunities to tour with foreign acts.
